name: Shifty Funky Walls
description:
"Press the R button to restart from any point of the game"

Shifty Funky Walls is a shapeshifting game, which was made for Ludum Dare 35. This version is the post jam project with all current planned features.

The game is a 3D sequel of "Shifty Walls" which can be played here.http://gamejolt.com/games/shifty-walls/45595

The goal of the game is to change your shape and adapt to the dance moves provided by your dance partner. When the time goes down, you've lost your chance. Or maybe not?

Credits (external assets):
Music: liquidspiral (newgrounds)
Music: saskid (newgrounds)
Sounds: berlinatmospheres (youtube)
